price: Jechi inni (nabi Muhammad SAW!) “yaa Gooftaa kiyya! Dhugumatti, isaan kun ummata hin amanne” jedhe (sunis Allaah bira jira).
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
